title: Best of the Program | Guests: Jack Posobiec & Ken Paxton | 5/24/22
description:
Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton joins to discuss his primary election, updates on the border, and the lawsuits against President Biden. Glenn and Stu go over the future America is headed toward, including digital money and a global monitoring system knowing your every move. TPUSA contributor Jack Posobiec shares how he was harassed and questioned by the World Economic Forum's police.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
